sense.def:
An advantage
je nekaj, kar človeka postavi v ugodnejši položaj v primerjavi z drugimi.

seg.quote: As a scientist I have a slight advantage over him.

sense.def:
An advantage
je tudi prednost, ki iz nečesa izvira.

seg.quote: The advantages of electricity are the lack of fumes and the ease of distribution.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
to one's advantage
, bo za tistega človeka koristno ali ugodno.

To take advantage of someone
pomeni s tisto osebo ravnati nepošteno zaradi svoje lastne koristi.

To take advantage of something
pomeni tisto čim bolje izkoristiti, dokler imamo priložnost.
